FuncDef:
The value-added-service policy command configures the value-added service policy used by the domain.
The undo value-added-service policy command restores the default setting.
By default, no value-added service policy is configured for the domain.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the service policy used by the domain. The policy must be a configured service policy.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-insensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The value-added-service policy command in the system view is used to create the value-added service policy used by the domain.
The value-added service policy used by the domain is a default value-added service policy applicable to all domain users. The service policy sent by the policy server takes precedence over the service policy configured in the policy template of the domain.
Precautions
Only DAA service template is allowed in each domain.
